fields.subject: start django
fields.content:
start new project by this command in linux:
django-admin startproject <name of project>
after that open settings.py and set time.

fields.subject: second step in django
fields.content:
create first app in your project.
open terminal window and type:
python manage.py startapp <nameofapp>

fields.subject: Third Step in Djnago
fields.content:
Now, we create models.In models.py create models.
Before creation notice to type of fields in models for objects.

fields.subject: 4th step in Django
fields.content: So, you have to create view to display what's thing do you want to show.
